questions.title: Swap Two Numbers
questions.description: Swap two numbers without using a temporary variable.

questions.title: Next Greater Element
questions.description: Find the next greater element for each element in an array.

questions.title: Build Heap
questions.description: Build a heap from an array.

questions.title: Rotting Oranges
questions.description: Find the minimum time for all oranges to rot in a grid.

questions.title: Longest Common Subsequence
questions.description: Find the length of the longest common subsequence between two strings.

questions.title: Detect Cycle in Directed Graph
questions.description: Detect if there is a cycle in a directed graph (course prerequisites).

questions.title: Lexicographically Smallest String
questions.description: Find the lexicographically smallest equivalent string.

questions.title: Linked List Cycle
questions.description: Determine if a linked list has a cycle.

questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Find indices of two numbers in an array that add up to a specific target.

questions.title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
questions.description: Merge two sorted linked lists into one sorted list.

questions.title: Valid Parentheses
questions.description: Determine if the input string has valid matching parentheses.

questions.title: Binary Search
questions.description: Implement binary search to find a target in a sorted array.

questions.title: Climbing Stairs
questions.description: Calculate the number of ways to reach the top of stairs.

questions.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
questions.description: Find the longest substring in a given string that is a palindrome.

questions.title: Merge Intervals
questions.description: Merge all overlapping intervals in a list.

questions.title: Unique Paths
questions.description: Find the number of unique paths from top-left to bottom-right in a grid.

questions.title: Coin Change
questions.description: Find the fewest number of coins needed to make up a given amount.

questions.title: Word Break
questions.description: Determine if a string can be segmented into words from a dictionary.

questions.title: Trapping Rain Water
questions.description: Compute how much water can be trapped between bars of different heights.

questions.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
questions.description: Find the median of two sorted arrays combined.
